description: The House of Detention is a bondage castle with many masters and many slaves. Master Tober Brandt is looking for trouble and finds slave chet walker in his cell. Slave chet is Master Van Darkholme's new slave and has not been trained. Master Tober takes it upon himself to give slave chet a nice hard flogging and a bondage fuck of his life.
title: Master Tober Brandt and slave chet.
